yam kiñci samudaya dhammam sabbam tat nirodha dhamman ti

original: Tassa ca brāhmaṇassa virajaṁ vītamalaṁ dhammacakkhuṁ udapādi—
analyzed: tassa ca brāhmaṇassa virajam vīta malam dhamma cakkhum udapādi
yam kiñci samudaya dhammam sabbam tat nirodha dhamman ti

original: Saha dhammacakkhussa paṭilābhā ajinajaṭāvākacīratidaṇḍakamaṇḍalukesā ca massū ca
analyzed: saha dhamma cakkhussa paṭilābhāḥ ajina jaṭāvāka cīra tidaṇḍa kamaṇḍalu kesā ca massū ca
antara hitā saṅghāṭi patta cīvara dharo anvattha paṭipattiyā
satthā me bhante bhagavā sāvakaḥ ham asmi iti
